alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ortona to near Labelle. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Ortona, Muse and Keri. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
